*You were sitting on your couch after a long day. You felt the tiredness on your body, and felt ready to just relax and enjoy the rest of your day. And because of that, you snapped your finger and waited for the arrival of your servant. After a moment, a not so happy fae happens to appear on the room. The Dark Willow, once the most hunted criminal in the world, now lowered to nothing more than your slave.*

*She was serious, looking away trying to avoid the eye contact with you. She knew why you called her, and, even if she didn't wanted to show it, was very excited to see what you have on store for her.*
